questions.question: Which company recently revised its profit expectations due to zeroing out a State Department contract, adjusting its earnings outlook to between $590 million and $630 million?
questions.explanation: Parsons Corporation revised its profit expectations after zeroing out its State Department contract, adjusting the outlook to $590 million to $630 million.
questions.source: Parsons Corporation's earnings revision due to contract changes.

questions.question: In May 2025, which company secured a $214.4 million contract to upgrade Multiple Launch Rocket Systems to the M270A2 configuration?
questions.explanation: Lockheed Martin won a $214.4 million contract in May 2025 to upgrade Multiple Launch Rocket Systems to the M270A2 configuration.
questions.source: Lockheed Martin's recent contract win for upgrading rocket systems.

questions.question: Which company was awarded a contract modification for integrated logistics support and lifecycle sustainment for the AN/SQQ-89 undersea warfare combat system, with work to be performed in multiple locations including Yokosuka, Japan?
questions.explanation: Leidos Inc. received a contract modification for integrated logistics support and lifecycle sustainment for the AN/SQQ-89 system, with work in various locations including Yokosuka, Japan.
questions.source: Leidos Inc.'s contract modification for the AN/SQQ-89 system.
